Joining Kai to talk about the week's news is Fortune's Leigh Gallagher and Cardiff Garcia from FT Alphaville. First up, we widen the scope of our "York & Fig" series to look at gentrification on a national scale. Then: we look at Friday's "unambiguously good" jobs report.

teaser: We talk "York & Fig" on a national level and good news from the Labor Department.
title: Weekly Wrap: Gentrification and and the jobs report
description: We talk "York & Fig" on a national level and good news from the Labor Department.
contentencoded: Joining Kai to talk about the week's news is Fortune's Leigh Gallagher and Cardiff Garcia from FT Alphaville. First up, we widen the scope of our "York & Fig" series to look at gentrification on a national scale. Then: we look at Friday's "unambiguously good" jobs report.
